arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Grimsby Town – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to face League Two side Grimsby Town on Wednesday night, desperately needing a victory to kick-start their season. After a winless start in the Premier League, this Carabao Cup tie is a crucial opportunity for Rúben Amorim to build confidence, though he is expected to rotate his starting eleven. arts.ttl: Grimsby Town Hoping to Catch a Big Fish With the Visit of Manchester United
arts.sum: After an unbeaten six-game streak to start 2025-26, Grimsby Town welcome Manchester United to Blundell Park in the League Cup this week. arts.ttl: Grimsby Town vs Man United: Carabao Cup Preview, Round 2, 2025
arts.sum: Man United kick-off their Carabao Cup campaign, travelling across the Pennines to League Two side Grimsby Town's Blundell Park. Jaze Kabia's first half goal was not enough for the Mariners to record their fourth league win of the season.
